description: With its advanced, purpose-driven design inspired by alpine professionals, the Konseal AR delivers agility, comfort, and the stability and support required for technical approaches with a full load. The durable, breathable nubuck suede upper provides longwearing comfort, and the technical outsole features a sharp edge for climbing, provides friction on rock and sure footing on trails, and features a Vibram® Megagrip compound for confident traction in wet or dry conditions across varied terrain.
name: Arcteryx Konseal AR - Mens
